entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You've helped bolster your forces by rallying demoralized troops.
entries.journal_entry_description: Some troops are losing their nerve to fight. Find some of these troops and convince them to return to the frontline.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Groups of demoralized troops are scattered throughout the area. Find them and convince them to return to the fighting.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Groups of demoralized troops are scattered throughout the area. Find them and convince them to return to the fighting.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Find and rally two more demoralized troops
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Find and rally one more demoralized soldier
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: You have successfully helped boster your factions forces by rallying the demoralized troops in the field.
